ul.li: Each day more than 5,500 students learn and thrive in Moorhead Area Public Schools. We are proud of your successes both inside and outside the classroom.

a.aria-label: Students - Horizon East Activities, Arts, Athletics

ul.li: Parents are partners. Your participation in your child's education is important to us. Use these resources and information as your child progresses from preschool on to college and careers.

h4.a: Horizon West Spuds Learn The Gift of Giving Back

p.span: Students learn essential skills and empathy while they support fellow students and friends at the Spud Store. A community group continues the spirit of giving back as needs increase for many families during this pandemic.

a.aria-label: Read More Horizon West Spuds Learn The Gift of Giving Back

p.span: The Indian Education Program at Moorhead Area Public Schools brings cultural learning experiences to Native American students. The latest initiative includes drumming lessons with a traditional drum.

a.aria-label: Read More Students Connect Through Cultural Activities

h4.a: Senior Spud Wins Big at Twin Cities Auto Show

p.span: Moorhead High School student Noah Brush has restored and rebuilt cars since he was 14-years-old. His hard work and dedication paid off at the end of March when he took home the first-place trophy.

a.aria-label: Read More Senior Spud Wins Big at Twin Cities Auto Show

p.span: The distance learning system is set up for flexibility. Each home will have a different way of making their learning environment successful.

a.aria-label: Read More Tips For Successful Distance Learning

h2.a: Meet Our Team: Josh St. Louis, Principal of S.G. Reinertsen

p.span: Meet Josh St. Louis, Principal of S.G. Reinertsen Elementary School.
His upbeat and energetic presence brings positivity and excitement into every interaction. As a firm believer in having fun, it’s his mission to make school...

a.aria-label: Read More Meet Our Team: Josh St. Louis, Principal of S.G. Reinertsen

h4.a: Spud Team Pulls Together For Distance Learning

p.span: After Minnesota Governor Tim Walz announced schools would be required to close and create a distance learning plan, Moorhead Area Public Schools went right to work.
It took a strong team working around the clock

a.aria-label: Read More Spud Team Pulls Together For Distance Learning

h4.a: Spuds Out in Two at State Hockey

p.span: This year’s Moorhead Spud Boys Hockey team can boast a number of accomplishments. With 13 seniors having played together since youth hockey, they tallied 21 wins...

a.aria-label: Read More Spuds Out in Two at State Hockey

h4.a: All Spuds Medal at State Weight Lifting Tournament with Four State Champions

p.span: Moorhead traveled to Cannon Falls for the State Weight Lifting tournament on March 7 to compete with 18 other teams and as part of 112 lifters.

a.aria-label: Read More All Spuds Medal at State Weight Lifting Tournament with Four State Champions
